objects.text: • FLORAL PATTERN • ELASTIC DESIGN • SUMMER COMFORT

product_details.name: Summer Dreams Two-Piece Set: Floral Crop Top & High-Waist Denim Shorts
product_details.description:
• Pink floral pattern cold-shoulder crop top with ruffle details
• Elastic off-shoulder design with adjustable straps
• Lightweight, breathable fabric perfect for summer
• High-waisted light blue denim shorts with rolled cuffs
• Elastic waistband for comfortable fit
• Functional front pockets
• Casual yet chic design suitable for beach, vacation, or daily wear
• Available in various sizes
• Easy-care machine washable materials
• Perfect combination of comfort and style for warm weather

banner_details:
The banner features a vibrant and playful summer theme with a clean circular layout at the center showcasing a cutout of a fashion model dressed in a floral top and denim shorts. The background has an abstract design combining soft overlapping waves and gradient color transitions from pink to light blue, giving it an energetic seasonal vibe. The main heading (id: `heading`) is bold and prominently displayed at the top. Below it, a smaller subheading (id: `subheading`) adds context. The price (id: `price`) is highlighted in a large white circle. Supporting feature text (id: `description`) is neatly aligned at the bottom. A bold call-to-action button (id: `cta`) is located just below, encouraging user interaction.

**Color Palette:**
- Light Pink (#FFD1DC)
- Coral Pink (#FF9AAD)
- Sky Blue (#A7C7E7)
- Deep Blue (#4682B4)
- Plum Purple (#8B3A62)
- White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image showcases a vibrant, youthful outfit featuring a pink floral off-shoulder top paired with high-waisted blue denim shorts. The dominant colors in the top include a rich **hot pink (#D42F6D)** and **white floral patterns (#F8F3F4)**, creating an energetic and eye-catching look. These shades contrast and highlight each other effectively, intensifying the visual appeal. The shorts are a cool, faded **denim blue (#6FA1AF)** with light stitching, introducing a calming, grounded aesthetic that balances the vividness of the top. Altogether, this color palette of warm and cool tones blends harmoniously, ideal for an advertisement banner that emphasizes freshness and youth.
